algorithm_technique: Sort meetings by start day and merge overlapping intervals to find busy periods.
problem_summary_simple: Count days within a total range that have no scheduled meetings.
problem_summary_technical: Sorts meetings and merges overlapping intervals to determine contiguous blocks of busy days, then calculates free days.
key_insights: Sorting the meetings by start time is crucial for efficient merging.
Merging overlapping intervals simplifies the problem into finding gaps between busy periods.
The total number of days can be very large, so an approach that doesn't iterate through all days is necessary.
